ygData.subject: RE: Where do I start?
ygData.msgSnippet: The first and foremost step is to put 20 training points into the skill. I m not sure exactly what stone you should start with at a skill of 20, so just buy a
ygData.messageBody:
The first and foremost step is to put 20 training points into the skill.

I'm not sure exactly what stone you should start with at a skill of 20, so
just buy a few silver bars and start at the bottom. If you get the 'trivial'
message, move to the next stone.

Make no mistake though, jewelcrafting is an expensive trade in its early
stages.

-Qinie, High Elf Enchantress

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Steve Fogle [SMTP:steve.fogle@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 19, 1999 12:40 PM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Where do I start?
>
> From: Steve Fogle <steve.fogle@...>
>
> My Enchanter is very close to 8th level. I want to do Jewel Crafting, but
> what do I start on first? I don't have a lot of coins, so I want the
> lowest
> cost approach (maybe I picked the wrong trade?).
>
> Thanks
>
